text: Abd al-Rahman Abd al-Khaliq () (5 November 1939 â€“ 29 September 2020) was an Egyptian-Kuwaiti Islamic scholar and preacher. He published more than 60 books related to Islam, especially Salafism. He was born in Monufia, Egypt. In 2011, he became a Kuwaiti citizen. Abd al-Khaliq died on 29 September 2020 in Kuwait City from a heart attack, aged 80. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Egyptian writers Category:Kuwaiti people
title: Abd al-Rahman Abd al-Khaliq
